markdownRemark.html: Located in Benalmadena. The Bil Bil House complex, which is managed by the company Antequera Golf has the only 18-hole Pitch and Putt golf course in Andalusia, and padel and tennis courts. There is a fully equipped gymnasium in the Club House, for anyone who wants to tone up their body and improve their muscle tone.

frontmatter.title: Bil Bil Golf
frontmatter.description: Bil Bil Golf - Located in Benalmadena. There is a fully equipped gymnasium in the Club House, for anyone who wants to tone up their body and improve their muscle tone.
frontmatter.address: Avenida Cibeles, S/N Residencial Benalmádena Golf 29639 BENALMÁDENA, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 19.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 19.00 euros
